data.document: Man2html 2.1 and earlier allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a temporary file.

references.name: 19990820 [SECURITY] New versions of man2html fixes postinst glitch

data.name: CVE-1999-0477
data.document: The Expression Evaluator in the ColdFusion Application Server allows a remote attacker to upload files to the server via openfile.cfm, which does not restrict access to the server properly.

data.name: CVE-1999-1052

data.document: Windows NT 4.0 allows local users to cause a denial of service via a user mode application that closes a handle that was opened in kernel mode, which causes a crash when the kernel attempts to close the handle.

data.document: Microsoft SQL Server 6.5 uses weak encryption for the password for the SQLExecutiveCmdExec account and stores it in an accessible portion of the registry, which could allow local users to gain privileges by reading and decrypting the CmdExecAccount value.

data.name: CVE-1999-0016
data.document: Land IP denial of service.

references.name: 19981002 Several potential security problems in IBM/Tivoli OPC Tracker Age nt

19990126 Javascript ecurity bug in Internet Explorer

19990209 Re: IIS4 allows proxied password attacks over NetBIOS
